```{r}
merged_data <- merge(imdb_basics_data, imdb_crew_data, by = "tconst")

library(tidyr)
final_merged_data <- merge(merged_data, imdb_name_basics, by.x = "directors", by.y = "nconst")

# View the final merged dataset
head(final_merged_data)
```
